title: Suzanne Lyall /// Part 1 /// 422
description:
Suzanne Lyall /// Part 1 /// 422

Part 1 of 2


www.TrueCrimeGarage.com

This week join the Gents in the garage as they dive into this cold case from New York. They will attempt to retrace Suzanne’s steps to find out when and where she disappeared. After a cold one or two they might even have a few potential suspects.
Beer of the Week - Paradox Pilsner by Paradox Brewery Garage Grade - 3 and 3 quarter bottle caps out of 5
The full archive of True Crime Garage is available on the Stitcher listening app - for FREE. Our show “Off the Record” is only on Stitcher Premium. For a FREE month of listening go to http://stitcherpremium.com/truecrimegarage and use promo code GARAGE

Beer Fund: https://truecrimegarage.com/home
